name: Wrath of the Mages
description:
"Wrath of the Mages"

You, one of the great Mages, has a special task which is to get all the golden items here in the arena of Heraltuin. This will help you summon the forbidden food that will kill all humanity.

The game revolves in killing the monsters, getting the loots, and summoning other mages that will help you in fighting.

Controls:

  • [F] - to cast a spell
  • [S] - to summon a mage
  • [Spacebar] - to execute the final spell 
    • This will be triggered once you have all the golden items

Made in "GODOT"

Created by: lpancho aka "FatFat05"
